actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide that the Washington Monument, the Lincoln Memorial, and the Jefferson Memorial be illuminated all night during calendar year 1976.

summary.text: Provides that the Washington Monument, the Lincoln Memorial, and the Jefferson Memorial shall be illuminated all night during calendar year 1976.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide that the Washington Monument, the Lincoln Memorial, and the Jefferson Memorial be illuminated all night during calendar year 1976.
